Assets

Assets are resources files that can be accessed via an URL (images, icons, fonts, etc.)

⚭ Path

The source files are located under [NWAYO_ROOT]/components/[NAME]/assets/

⚭ Types

They are 5 types of assets:

  • Fonts
  • Icons
  • Images
  • Inline images
  • Raw

⚭ Bundles

In the bundle file, components listed under assets property will have all their assets built into the bundle's build directory.

⚭ Tasks

These tasks interact with the assets

  • assets
  • assets-fonts
  • assets-images
  • assets-images-highdensity
  • assets-images-optimization
  • assets-raw
  • icons
  • icons-favicon
  • icons-icon
  • icons-large
  • icons-tile
  • icons-touch
  • styles
  • styles-compile
  • styles-images
  • rebuild
  • rebuild-ss
